original_title: Enter Shikari - Kerrang! presents Enter Shikari live in St. Vitus bar!
overview: Good news, citizens of New York: we're putting on a show at St. Vitus in Brooklyn with none other than Enter Shikari!  Taking place on September 28 at 8pm, Enter Shikari play a super-intimate show at the famed Brooklyn dive bar, alongside New Jersey's Can't Swim.
tagline: Kerrang! presents Enter Shikari live in St. Vitus bar!
title: Enter Shikari - Kerrang! presents Enter Shikari live in St. Vitus bar!
